to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

definition: Bradford, city in West Yorkshire, England
William Bradley "Brad" Pitt (1963-), US actor and film producer
Julia Gillard (1961-), Australian politician, prime minister from 2010
pinyin: Zhu1 li4 ya3 · Ji2 la1 de2

definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania/abbr. to 費城|费城[Fei4 cheng2]
pinyin: Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4

sentences.english: Steven Gerrard today backed calls for the introduction of goal-line technology.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德今天表示了他对引入球门线技术的支持。

sentences.english: Walton will continue to split time with Radmanovic.
sentences.chinese: 沃顿将继续和拉德马诺维奇分享上场时间。

sentences.english: Bradley’s effort was just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 布拉德利的努力仅仅是个开端。

sentences.english: You ever been to the Fauntleroy Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 布拉德，你去过芳勒瑞旅馆吗？

sentences.english: He had learned from earlier writers, like Ring Lardner and Sherwood Anderson.
sentences.chinese: 他学会了从早期的作家，如环拉德纳和舍伍德安德森。

sentences.english: Gerard tried the light on the nightstand, but it was out.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德试图打开床头灯，但灯没亮。

sentences.english: Radmanovic added eight points in the third, including two 3-pointers.
sentences.chinese: 拉德马诺维奇在第三节拿下8分，其中有两个3分球。

sentences.english: 'China will continue to grow, and grow strongly, ' Ms. Gillard said.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德说，中国经济将继续增长，而且会非常强劲。

sentences.english: Bradley was able to witness his parents' marriage at Christmastime that year.
sentences.chinese: 那年圣诞节期间，布拉德利有幸见证了他父母的婚礼。

sentences.english: It was past one by the time I got to Gerard’s.
sentences.chinese: 这是我去杰拉德家的一段往事。

sentences.english: I think it's safe to say it's the bad Vlad.
sentences.chinese: 我只是觉得说坏蛋弗拉德的话保险一点。

sentences.english: Everyone I know is happy Gilad will be free.
sentences.chinese: 我认识的所有人都很高兴吉拉德可以回来。

sentences.english: Ms. Gillard predicted Saturday's ballot will be an 'absolute cliffhanger.'
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德预测，周六的投票毫无疑问将“扣人心弦”。

sentences.english: I had ridden from Fairbanks to Prudhoe Bay in about 12 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我已经充满从费尔班克斯向普拉德霍湾约12个小时。

sentences.english: We stayed at the Melia Varadero Resort.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在苦巴拉德罗度假村。

sentences.english: Conrads narrative characteristic is quite remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 康拉德的叙述特点十分引人注目。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
